physical_appearance:This is a photograph of a trading mills in Rangoon. The building structure is made of a few roofed spaces
 with two chimneys seen in the background. There are rows of wood logs on the ground. The mills are located on the bank of a water body. On the right of the photograph
 there is a boat. The title is written at the bottom
 below the photograph.

metadata.physical_appearance: This is a photograph of a trading mills in Rangoon. The building structure is made of a few roofed spaces, with two chimneys seen in the background. There are rows of wood logs on the ground. The mills are located on the bank of a water body. On the right of the photograph, there is a boat. The title is written at the bottom, below the photograph.
